author: jerenkrantz
msg: Day?  It is still night isn't it?
*mumbles something about becoming a pumpkin several hours ago*

author: thommay
msg: Yet another horrendous day in London town

author: wrowe
msg: More handle leakage.  We need to be explicit when we create a duplicate
handle for a child or all our children's children end up with the polution.

author: wrowe
msg: Handle leaks right now are a huge problem.  Close two of them.

author: brianp
msg: Use storage on the stack instead of apr_palloc in apr_poll()
when the number of descriptors is small
(Note: The poll API still needs a rewrite in order to be
usable with large numbers of descriptors.  This change is
just a short-term hack to work around the memory leak that
apr_poll() was causing in the httpd.)
